item.title: Call an API
item.description: Call APIs by creating a Client and calling the Call() method. This takes the endpoint to call and an optional request body for non HEAD and GET requests. Call() can be passed an optional request builder to set the path and query parameters and request headers. The Call() method returns a standard http.Response. requestBody := map[string]interface{}{"Foo": "bar"} responseBody := map[string]interface{}{} // Construct a new client var client = NewClient("http://localhost:8080/") // Call an endpoint resp, err := client.
